Reviews.Title: no instructions
Reviews.Author: Ron Goddard
Reviews.Content: NO INSTRUCTIONS!!! I can figure out some but not the more advanced functions I was hopping for. Price was decent though.

Reviews.Title: Super small
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Easy to carry and it works. What else can you say. I bought it to show the pictures as I have the projector built into my camera.

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon ML-L5 Remote Control for Nikon Coolpix S1100pj Digital Camera
